name: BodyWeight
title: Body weight
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes for lab tests that represent the result of measurement or observation of body weight.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype Physical Exam, Finding.  The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have had an observation or measurement of their body weight.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only codes that represent a measurement or observation of a person's body weight in LOINC.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes any codes or concepts which do not represent body weight as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
